meta.dc:title: S1693 ENR: National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act of 2019
meta.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
meta.dc:creator: Xcential BillDTD to USLM Converter v20200824
meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
To reauthorize the National Flood Insurance Program.

main.name: S1693

content.p: To reauthorize the National Flood Insurance Program.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Short title.
section.content: This Act may be cited as the “National Flood Insurance Program Extension Act of 2019”.

section.heading: Reauthorization of National Flood Insurance Program.

subsection.heading: Financing.—
subsection.content: Section 1309(a) of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 4016(a)) is amended by striking “May 31, 2019” and inserting “June 14, 2019”.

subsection.heading: Program expiration.—
subsection.content: Section 1319 of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 4026) is amended by striking “May 31, 2019” and inserting “June 14, 2019”.

subsection.heading: Retroactive effective date.—
subsection.content: If this Act is enacted after May 31, 2019, the amendments made by subsections (a) and (b) shall take effect as if enacted on May 31, 2019.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
